manifest.description: Path to the `package.json` file, defaults to the `package.json` file in the project folder

main.description: Main file, defaults to the `main` or `exports` property of the manifest

tsconfig.description: Path to the tsconfig.json file, defaults to `<projectFolder>/tsconfig.json`

keepScripts.description: Whether to keep the scripts in package.json, defaults to false

keepDevDependencies.description: Whether to keep the devDependencies in package.json, defaults to false

inlineStyleLanguage.description: Language for inline styles in components, defaults to `css`

include.description: Globs to include in the asset, relative to `from`

from.description: The path to include the assets from, defaults to the root of the active project

to.description: The path to write the assets to, defaults to the folder the package is being built into

allowEmpty.description: Whether to succeed when no files are found for this asset

packager.description: Packager to run after building, e.g. `@snuggery/yarn:pack`. If the builder name is `pack` it can be left, out, e.g. `@snuggery/yarn` will run the same builder as `@snuggery/yarn:pack`.

outputFolder.description: The folder to build the package to, defaults to `<projectFolder>/dist`

plugins.description: List of plugins to use while building

flags.description: Flags that change how the angular packages are built by this builder

usePrivateApiAsImportIssueWorkaround.description: Choose which workaround to use to prevent angular from mistakenly outputting deep imports: a private API or a very specific find-and-replace. Defaults to `true`

enableApiExtractor.description: Enable API flattening, as prescribed by the Angular Package Format. Enabling this flag can double the time it takes to build a package. Defaults to `false`

useCentralOutputFolder.description: Whether the `outputFolder` defaults to a centralized folder or a folder per package, defaults to true unless Yarn PnP is detected
